## üéôÔ∏è AI Audio Transcription with VLM Run

**Overview:**
Automatically transcribes audio files from Gmail and generates formatted transcription reports in Google Docs.

**Workflow:**
1. üìß Monitor Gmail for audio attachments

**Perfect for:**
- Meeting recordings
- Voice memos
- Interview transcriptions
- Podcast notes
- Audio journalism
- Accessibility documentation


**Requirements:**
- VLM Run API access
- Gmail OAuth2
- Google Docs OAuth2
- Webhook endpoint

## üìß Gmail Audio Detection

**Monitors incoming emails and automatically downloads audio attachments.**

**Process:**
1. Polls Gmail every minute
2. Detects new emails with attachments
3. Downloads audio files automatically
4. Triggers transcription workflow


**Supported Formats:**
- MP3, WAV, M4A
- AAC, OGG, FLAC
- Various bitrates
- Mobile recordings


**Configuration:**
- Enable attachment downloads
- Automatic file extraction

## ü§ñ Audio AI Processing

**VLM Run transcribes audio with high accuracy**

**Features:**
- Advanced speech recognition
- Automatic punctuation
- Timestamp generation


**Output:**
- Complete transcription
- Time-segmented text
- Metadata extraction
- Duration information


**Benefits:**
- Human-level accuracy
- Fast processing
- Consistent formatting
- Professional quality

## üîó Webhook Processing Flow

**How asynchronous transcription works:**

**Step 1:** Audio sent to VLM Run with callback URL
**Step 2:** Transcription starts in background
**Step 3:** Webhook receives completion
**Step 4:** Results formatted for Google Docs


**Why Async?**
- Handles long audio files
- Prevents workflow timeouts
- Better resource management
- Reliable processing


**Callback Data:**
- Complete transcript
- Segment timestamps
- Processing metadata
- Error handling

## üìÑ Professional Reports

**Creates beautifully formatted Google Docs with transcription results.**

**Report includes:**
- Date and timestamp
- Total audio duration
- Segmented transcription
- Time markers for each segment
- Professional formatting


**Output Location:**
- Specified Google Doc
- Appends new transcriptions
- Maintains formatting

nodes.name: Monitor Email Attachments
nodes.notes: Continuously monitors Gmail for new emails with audio attachments. Automatically downloads all attachments and triggers the transcription workflow.

nodes.name: VLM Run Audio Transcriber
nodes.notes: Processes audio files using VLM AI to generate accurate transcriptions with timestamps. Runs asynchronously for large audio files.

nodes.name: Receive Transcription Results
nodes.notes: Receives the completed transcription from VLM AI when asynchronous processing is finished. Contains full transcript with timestamps.

nodes.name: Generate Transcription Report
nodes.notes: Creates a professionally formatted Google Doc with the transcription results, including timestamps and metadata.
